channel.title: How do i make overpowered weapons?
channel.description: My problem here today is i need help making overpowered weapons my source is insidiax and if u could just comment below how that would help alot thanks!

item.title: How do i make overpowered weapons?
item.dc:creator: @Lanepker Lanepker
item.description:
@Lanepker wrote:

Fairly sure you could change the Bonuses of a Weapon in Item.cfg if it is the spec your talking about increasing Accuracy or Spec Damage etc that’s different.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make overpowered weapons?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Increase the weapon’s stat bonuses? For magic you might need to buff the spells themselves (or you could hack it up and make weapons give damage multipliers, same for ranged).
